markdownRemark.html:
This is NOT a tutorial on how to create a react app. Rather, this is for hosting the app on Heroku once the app has been created.

First, you must have the Heroku CLI installed.

Second, it is assumed that you have created a git repository (optionally hosted somewhere).

Third, in the root source directory of the React app, type this command to create a Heroku app.

heroku create -b https://github.com/mars/create-react-app-buildpack.git

You may also name the app if you choose.

Finally, commit and push the app to Heroku with these commands.

git add .
git commit -m "Commit message"
git push heroku master

frontmatter.title: Hosting React on Heroku
frontmatter.description: How to set up a repository to be hosted on Heroku.
